# Class ToolCallRequest

API-level wrapper for a list of tool calls. Used to pass tool call requests into the graph engine.

##### Index

### Methods

toExternal

## Methods

### toExternal

  * toExternal(): [ToolCallRequestData](./common_data_types_external_tool_call_data.ToolCallRequestData)

Convenience helper to convert to the external/native data type.
